Progress.name: Progress
Progress.description: Shows the progress of the project by calculating the percentage of completed tasks related to it.

Edited.name: Edited
Edited.description: The date and time this project was last edited.

Created.name: Created
Created.description: The date and time this project page was created.

Meta.name: Meta
Meta.description: This formula property displays the number of active tasks in the project, along with the number of overdue tasks.

formula.expression:
lets(
	active,
	{{notion:block_property:TWP%60:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:c071aa24-b1a2-4f78-b209-0b11d129cf4b}}
		.filter(
			current.{{notion:block_property:oHKB:1a5abcb1-dcc4-81a4-af34-fd482e85f4df:c071aa24-b1a2-4f78-b209-0b11d129cf4b}} != "Done" and current.{{notion:block_property:oHKB:1a5abcb1-dcc4-81a4-af34-fd482e85f4df:c071aa24-b1a2-4f78-b209-0b11d129cf4b}} != current.{{notion:block_property:MI%3A%60:1a5abcb1-dcc4-81a4-af34-fd482e85f4df:c071aa24-b1a2-4f78-b209-0b11d129cf4b}}.at(2).last()
		)
		.length(),
	overdue,
	{{notion:block_property:TWP%60:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:c071aa24-b1a2-4f78-b209-0b11d129cf4b}}
		.filter(
			current.{{notion:block_property:oHKB:1a5abcb1-dcc4-81a4-af34-fd482e85f4df:c071aa24-b1a2-4f78-b209-0b11d129cf4b}} != "Done" and current.{{notion:block_property:oHKB:1a5abcb1-dcc4-81a4-af34-fd482e85f4df:c071aa24-b1a2-4f78-b209-0b11d129cf4b}} != current.{{notion:block_property:MI%3A%60:1a5abcb1-dcc4-81a4-af34-fd482e85f4df:c071aa24-b1a2-4f78-b209-0b11d129cf4b}}.at(2).last()
			and now().dateBetween(current.{{notion:block_property:lQh%3C:1a5abcb1-dcc4-81a4-af34-fd482e85f4df:c071aa24-b1a2-4f78-b209-0b11d129cf4b}}, "days") > 0
		)
		.length(),
	ifs(
		{{notion:block_property:TWP%60:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:c071aa24-b1a2-4f78-b209-0b11d129cf4b}}.length() == 0,
		"",
		active == 0,
		"",
		if(
			overdue == 0,
			(active + " Active").style("blue"),
			(active.style("b") + " Active - ").style("blue") 
			+ (overdue.style("b") + " Overdue").style("red")
		)
	)
)

Tasks.name: Tasks
Tasks.description: Tasks that are part of this Project. This Relation property connects to the Project Relation property in the All Tasks database.

Latest Activity.name: Latest Activity
Latest Activity.description:
Returns the date and time of the latest activity in the project – including the project itself, along with any tasks or notes directly related to it.

Used for allowing projects to be sorted by Latest Activity in certain views.

Status.name: Status
Status.description: The status of the project. For “projects” that contain ongoing/maintenance items, use the Ongoing status.

options.name: Planned
options.description: Projects that you've planned to do, but haven't started yet.

options.name: On Hold
options.description: Projects that have already been started, but are currently paused from active work.

options.name: Doing
options.description: Projects with a defined end goal that you're currently working on.

options.name: Ongoing
options.description: Projects that collect and organize tasks meant to maintain an ongoing standard (e.g. maintenance tasks in an Area within the PARA system).

Archived.name: Archived
Archived.description: If checked, this project is Archived. It will be removed from all main project views, and will show up in the Archived view.

Localization Key.name: Localization Key
Localization Key.description:
This property allows you to define translated names for the Project database's key Status options – Planned, On Hold, Doing, Ongoing, and Done.

These are important for filters in certain database views.
